response.overview: In a high-tech future, Kasiana, the daughter of a time-machine tycoon, is sent to study in Chiang Mai—Thailand’s leading tech city—where she unexpectedly falls in love with Mia, a local girl. When Kasiana is suddenly called back home and her future is decided for her, the two must choose between destiny and desire. A story of love, time, and the courage to follow one’s heart.
response.title: Mamia
